#!/usr/bin/env ruby text = STDIN.read
text.gsub!(/(\([^\)]+)\s+(\*\))/, '\1\2')
offset_to_first_colon = text.index(':')
argument_triplets = text.scan /(.+?):\s*\((.+?)\)\s*([^\s]*)\s*/
print(argument_triplets.collect do |triplet| sprintf "%#{offset_to_first_colon}s:(%s)%s", triplet[0], triplet[1], triplet[2] end.join("\n"))
print $1 if text.match /(\n+)\z/
